mapper.select: SELECT h.hotel_id as hotelId, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_image, MIN(i.room_price) AS room_price, NVL(COUNT(r.review_point), 0) AS rcount, NVL(ROUND(AVG(r.review_point), 1), 0) AS avgpoint FROM hotel h full outer JOIN room_info i ON h.hotel_id = i.hotel_id full outer JOIN review r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_id, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_point, h.hotel_image

SELECT h.hotel_id as hotelId, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_image, MIN(i.room_price) AS room_price, NVL(COUNT(r.review_point), 0) AS rcount, NVL(ROUND(AVG(r.review_point), 1), 0) AS avgpoint FROM hotel h full outer JOIN room_info i ON h.hotel_id = i.hotel_id full outer JOIN review r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id where h.hotel_id = #{hotelId} GROUP BY h.hotel_id, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_point, h.hotel_image
select * from room_info where hotel_id = #{hotelId} order by room_name
select * from review where hotel_id = #{hotelId} order by review_id

select * from hotel h FULL OUTER JOIN room_info i USING (hotel_id)
